meanings.definition: Edit (a film, recording, or other material) before it is finalized for release.
meanings.sent1: The director preedited the movie to fix any mistakes before showing it to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The team preedited the podcast to ensure it was ready for upload.
meanings.sent3: I preedited my essay so many times that I practically have it memorized now.
meanings.sent4: She preedited her speech like a sculptor shaping a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The author preedited the manuscript meticulously, leaving no room for errors.
